name: Verify phone numbers with sms77.io and add them to Agile CRM
description:
Every time someone fills out your Google Form, Make will automatically verify the number with sms77.io. Then, a contact is added to Agile CRM.
The template uses [this model](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSegovAprIIkm19PW0l1zrycFcgRVu5ZjTyR58MLm2ahcSoW-g/viewform) from Google Forms.
